member.name: T:MonoDevelop.Packaging.ProjectFileMigrator

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.Packaging.CreateNuGetPackageBuildTarget.Build(MonoDevelop.Core.ProgressMonitor,MonoDevelop.Projects.ConfigurationSelector,System.Boolean,MonoDevelop.Projects.OperationContext)
member.summary:
If the project is a NuGet packaging project then just use the normal build target. This ensures that the dependent projects are built.
Otherwise the Pack target is called.
